hadiths.text: It was narrated from 'Aishah that Umm Habibah and Umm Salamah mentioned a church that they had seen in Ethiopia, in which there were images. The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said:"Those people, if there was a righteous man among them, when he died they built a place of worship over his grave and made those images. They will be the most evil of creation before Allah on the Day of Resurrection

chapter.ara-name: باب النِّهْىِ عَنِ اتِّخَاذِ الْقُبُورِ، مَسَاجِدَ
chapter.eng-name: The Prohibition Of Taking Graves As Masjids
